fruits.name: Apple
fruits.description: A crisp and sweet fruit available in many varieties, rich in fiber.

fruits.name: Banana
fruits.description: A soft and sweet fruit, rich in potassium, great for a snack.

fruits.name: Orange
fruits.description: A juicy citrus fruit rich in vitamin C, with a sweet-tart flavor.

fruits.name: Strawberry
fruits.description: A bright red, sweet, and juicy fruit rich in antioxidants.

fruits.name: Mango
fruits.description: A tropical fruit with sweet, juicy orange flesh.

fruits.name: Pineapple
fruits.description: A tropical fruit with sweet and tangy juicy yellow flesh.

fruits.name: Watermelon
fruits.description: A large summer fruit with red, sweet, and refreshing flesh.

fruits.name: Blueberry
fruits.description: A small blue fruit, sweet and rich in antioxidants.

fruits.name: Avocado
fruits.description: A creamy fruit rich in healthy fats, often used in savory dishes.

fruits.name: Grapes
fruits.description: Small, sweet fruits available in various colors, also used for wine.

fruits.name: Papaya
fruits.description: A tropical fruit with sweet, orange flesh and black seeds.

fruits.name: Kiwi
fruits.description: A small green fruit with a sweet-tart flavor, rich in vitamin C.

fruits.name: Peach
fruits.description: A sweet and juicy fruit with soft, velvety skin.

fruits.name: Pear
fruits.description: A juicy, sweet fruit with a grainy texture.

fruits.name: Plum
fruits.description: A sweet and juicy fruit available in various colors.

fruits.name: Cherries
fruits.description: Small, sweet or tart fruits, often dark red in color.

fruits.name: Cantaloupe
fruits.description: A sweet, juicy melon with orange flesh rich in vitamins.

fruits.name: Apricot
fruits.description: A small, sweet, slightly tart fruit with orange flesh.

fruits.name: Pomegranate
fruits.description: An exotic fruit with juicy, crunchy seeds rich in antioxidants.

fruits.name: Coconut
fruits.description: A tropical fruit with a hard shell, white flesh, and hydrating water.

fruits.name: Lemon
fruits.description: A yellow citrus fruit used for its sour juice in drinks and dishes.

fruits.name: Lime
fruits.description: A green citrus fruit known for its tangy juice used in drinks and flavoring.

fruits.name: Raspberry
fruits.description: A small, red fruit with a tart-sweet flavor, rich in fiber.

fruits.name: Blackberry
fruits.description: A juicy black fruit, slightly tart and rich in vitamins and fiber.

fruits.name: Guava
fruits.description: A tropical fruit with sweet, aromatic flesh rich in vitamin C.

fruits.name: Passion fruit
fruits.description: A small, purple fruit with a tart and aromatic pulp.

fruits.name: Dragon fruit
fruits.description: A tropical fruit with bright pink skin and mildly sweet, white or red flesh.

fruits.name: Fig
fruits.description: A sweet fruit with a soft texture and small seeds inside.

fruits.name: Grapefruit
fruits.description: A citrus fruit with a slightly sour and bitter flavor, rich in vitamin C.

fruits.name: Starfruit
fruits.description: A tropical fruit with a star-shaped cross section and a sweet-sour taste.

fruits.name: Lychee
fruits.description: A small, tropical fruit with sweet, translucent flesh inside a rough red skin.

fruits.name: Persimmon
fruits.description: A sweet, orange fruit with a soft, jelly-like texture when ripe.

fruits.name: Tangerine
fruits.description: A small, orange citrus fruit with a sweet and tangy flavor.

fruits.name: Cranberry
fruits.description: A tart red fruit, often used in sauces and juices.

fruits.name: Clementine
fruits.description: A small, easy-to-peel citrus fruit with a sweet flavor.

fruits.name: Jackfruit
fruits.description: A large tropical fruit with sweet, fibrous flesh, often used as a meat substitute.

fruits.name: Durian
fruits.description: A large, spiky fruit with a strong odor but creamy, sweet flesh inside.

fruits.name: Quince
fruits.description: A fragrant fruit with a tart taste, often used in jams and desserts.

fruits.name: Custard Apple
fruits.description: A tropical fruit with creamy, sweet flesh and a custard-like texture.

fruits.name: Salak (Snake Fruit)
fruits.description: A tropical fruit with a reddish-brown scaly skin and sweet, tangy flesh.

fruits.name: Mangosteen
fruits.description: A tropical fruit with sweet, juicy white flesh, often called the 'queen of fruits'.

fruits.name: Acai
fruits.description: Small dark purple berries, rich in antioxidants, native to the Amazon rainforest.

fruits.name: Goji Berry
fruits.description: Small red berries with a slightly tart taste, often used in health food for their nutrient content.

fruits.name: Medlar
fruits.description: A small fruit with soft, sweet, and juicy flesh, similar to an apricot or peach.

fruits.name: Ribes
fruits.description: Small berries available in red, black, or white varieties, used in jams, jellies, and desserts.

fruits.name: Ackee
fruits.description: A tropical fruit used mainly in savory dishes, especially popular in Jamaica.

fruits.name: Cacao
fruits.description: The fruit from which chocolate is made, containing seeds that are processed into cocoa.

fruits.name: Gooseberry
fruits.description: Small, tart fruits used in pies, jams, and sauces, rich in antioxidants.

fruits.name: Yuzu
fruits.description: A citrus fruit with a highly aromatic rind, commonly used in Japanese cuisine for its tart juice and zest.

fruits.name: Sea Buckthorn
fruits.description: A bright orange berry rich in vitamin C and omega fatty acids, used in juices and skin products.
